topic.title: Procedure Entry Plan Of Care Activity Procedure - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClass
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentProcedureMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentProcedureMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentProcedureMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentProcedureMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentProcedureMood::RQO

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <procedure xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"/> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19"/> <id root="4beb4e5b-52ed-440a-91ad-d6488c78bcac"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2011"/> <high value="2011"/> </effectiveTime> </procedure>
